title: puraharajAyE
sahitya:
puraharajAyE pAlayamAm


anupallavi

  caraNAmbuja bhaktim dEhi mE karuNAnidhE nirAmayE mAyE


caraNam 1    alikulavENi bhavAni pAvani kalarava mrdutara vANi sharvANi 
kali mOcani bAlE kamanIya guNa shIlE tilakAncita bAlE dhrtamaNImAlE
    caraNam 2    bhAnukOTi samAbha sharIrE pAlita muni nikarE gambhIrE 
dInajana pOSaNI nata suta tOSaNi daitya kula shOSaNi sulabhE manjubhASiNI
    caraNam 3    kAma pIThagatE kalyANi kAmAkSi kAmita phaladE shrI lalitE 
sOmamukhi purANi sundari kaumAri shyAmakrSNa sOdari shaila rAjakumAri
